name: Warrior Core & Mental Resilience (Toughness & Focus)
description: Training designed to forge mental toughness, unshakable focus, and combat stamina through extreme resilience-building techniques.

workout_groups.name: Meditation & Focus Training
workout_groups.description: Developing combat-ready mental clarity, heightened awareness, and inner resilience through intense focus techniques.

workouts.name: Stillness Drill (Eyes Closed, Body Awareness)
workouts.description: Stand or sit with eyes closed and focus on individual body parts, maintaining full-body awareness.

workouts.name: Deep Breath Counting Meditation
workouts.description: Breathe in and out slowly while mentally counting each breath, resetting if attention drifts.

workouts.name: Slow Blink Focus Drill
workouts.description: Focus on an object in front of you while slowly blinking, training perception and awareness.

workouts.name: Peripheral Awareness Expansion
workouts.description: Softly focus on a central point while expanding awareness to detect movement in peripheral vision.

workouts.name: Silent Countdown Mental Control
workouts.description: Mentally count down from 100 to 1 at a steady pace while maintaining calm breathing.

workouts.name: Sound Distancing Awareness
workouts.description: Sit in silence and mentally map out nearby and distant sounds without turning your head.

workouts.name: One-Legged Balance Focus
workouts.description: Stand on one leg with eyes open or closed, focusing on breath control and balance awareness.

workouts.name: Breath Sync Coordination
workouts.description: Inhale deeply and time your exhale to match an external rhythm, like footsteps or a mental count.

workouts.name: Gaze Holding Challenge
workouts.description: Fixate on a specific point without blinking or shifting focus, improving concentration and discipline.

workouts.name: Intentional Muscle Relaxation
workouts.description: Consciously tense and release each muscle group while maintaining slow, controlled breathing.

workouts.name: Slow Motion Hand Movements
workouts.description: Move hands through the air as if moving through water, maintaining smooth control and awareness.

workouts.name: Step & Breathe Walking Meditation
workouts.description: Walk slowly, timing each step with deep, controlled breathing for a fully mindful movement experience.

workouts.name: Silent Vocalization Control
workouts.description: Mentally repeat a phrase or word without moving your lips or throat, strengthening inner focus.

workouts.name: Micro-Tension Release Training
workouts.description: Scan your body for unnecessary tension (jaw, hands, shoulders) and consciously relax each area.

workouts.name: Sensory Limitation Drill (Eyes Closed, Hands Behind Back)
workouts.description: Stand still with eyes closed and hands behind back, focusing only on balance and sound.

workouts.name: Combat Breathing Under Load
workouts.description: Hold a plank or horse stance while performing controlled combat breathing (inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s).

workouts.name: Target Lock Meditation (Focus Expansion)
workouts.description: Fixate on a moving object (e.g., spinning stick, metronome, pendulum) while maintaining hyper-focus awareness of the periphery.

workouts.name: Silat Shadow Reflex Training
workouts.description: Meditate in a low horse stance while reacting to a partner or AI-generated light cues, shadow movements, or hand feints.

workouts.name: Sound Isolation & Disruption Control
workouts.description: Wear earplugs or noise-canceling headphones, then train reaction time & mental discipline with random bursts of loud, sudden noise (or silence).

workouts.name: Visualization Under Physical Duress
workouts.description: While holding push-up position, wall sit, or planks, visualize executing a perfect combat sequence or Kicky Flip attack with extreme detail.

workouts.name: Combat Visualization Under Adrenaline
workouts.description: Perform rapid jumping jacks for 30s, then immediately sit and visualize an entire combat sequence in detail.

workouts.name: Deep Silence Sensory Training
workouts.description: Sit completely still in silence, avoiding all reactions to sudden sounds, movements, or disruptions.

workouts.name: Hyper-Awareness Drill (Crowded Environment)
workouts.description: Focus on a single object while remaining aware of every peripheral movement in a crowded space.

workouts.name: Plank & Breath Control Under Fatigue
workouts.description: Hold a plank while regulating breathing (inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s), resisting fatigue.

workouts.name: Blindfolded Reflex Response Drill
workouts.description: Stand blindfolded while reacting to unexpected physical taps, sounds, or cues from a partner.

workouts.name: Peripheral Target Recognition
workouts.description: Focus straight ahead while tracking the number of moving objects detected in peripheral vision.

workouts.name: One-Legged Stance in Moving Airflow
workouts.description: Stand on one leg while resisting external forces (wind, fan, or partner pushing air at you).

workouts.name: Slow-Motion Combat Striking with Focus
workouts.description: Execute combat strikes at ultra-slow speed, maintaining full concentration on muscle activation.

workouts.name: Tactical Breath Holding Under Load
workouts.description: Hold breath while carrying a weight (sandbag, kettlebell) to simulate breath control under pressure.

workouts.name: Sudden Light-Darkness Transition Focus
workouts.description: Switch from darkness to bright light instantly and refocus within 3 seconds to avoid disorientation.

workouts.name: Moving Meditation with Combat Rhythm
workouts.description: Shadowbox at half-speed while mentally controlling each motion in perfect rhythm with breathing.

workouts.name: Vibration Resistance Stance (Shaking Surface)
workouts.description: Hold a horse stance or plank while standing on a mildly shaking or vibrating surface (created with a partner tapping or shifting a platform).

workouts.name: Underwater Mental Focus Drill
workouts.description: Submerge in cold water and maintain absolute mental clarity, avoiding panic or reactive breathing.

workouts.name: Tactile Disruption Control
workouts.description: Sit still while a partner lightly taps different areas of your body unpredictably, maintaining absolute stillness and control.

workouts.name: Extreme Low-Light Focus Training
workouts.description: Train focus in a near-dark room with only subtle moving light sources, forcing the eyes to adjust quickly.

workouts.name: Rapid Switching Mental Endurance Test
workouts.description: Rapidly switch focus between multiple unpredictable movement sources while maintaining perfect tracking.

workouts.name: Hypoxia-Resilience Combat Breathwork
workouts.description: Breathe in cycles of increasing oxygen deprivation (inhale, exhale, hold breath longer each round) while maintaining absolute control.

workout_groups.name: Cold Water Training for Mental Toughness
workout_groups.description: Training the nervous system’s resilience under extreme conditions.

workouts.name: Cold Exposure Breath Control (Wim Hof Inspired)
workouts.description: Immerse hands/feet in ice water while performing powerful oxygenation breathing to resist the cold.

workouts.name: Cold Water Combat Tension Drills
workouts.description: Hold push-up or plank position in a cold shower while tightening specific muscle groups in sequential focus (core, arms, legs).

workouts.name: Mist Training (Mental Disorientation Recovery)
workouts.description: Train combat footwork drills under a cold mist or light rain spray to condition reaction speed in low-visibility, freezing conditions.

workouts.name: Shock & Recover Conditioning
workouts.description: Immerse hands, feet, or entire body in cold water, then execute explosive combat movements immediately upon exiting.

workouts.name: Sub-Zero Precision Training
workouts.description: Perform fine motor skill drills (trigger pulls, knife handling, small object manipulation) with cold hands to train under numbed conditions.

workout_groups.name: High-Fatigue Workouts for Combat Stamina
workout_groups.description: Training endurance, willpower, and sustained combat output under extreme exhaustion.

workouts.name: Endurance Circuit: No Rest Allowed
workouts.description: Rotate between push-ups, squats, sprints, heavy bag strikes, and burpees without stopping to push the body past fatigue thresholds.

workouts.name: Shadowboxing Under Fatigue
workouts.description: After sprinting for 30 seconds, perform shadowboxing with full striking speed while maintaining fluid motion despite exhaustion.

workouts.name: Plank-to-Pushup Burnout
workouts.description: Hold a plank for 30 seconds, then immediately transition into rapid push-ups until failure.

workouts.name: Horse Stance Burnout with Sandbag Hold
workouts.description: Hold a deep horse stance while carrying a weighted object (or kettlebell) for max time endurance.

workouts.name: Hyperventilation Sprints
workouts.description: Perform rapid hyperventilation breathing before a full-speed sprint to simulate oxygen deprivation training.
